name: S-morris-site
body:
About Sean Morris

My name is Sean Morris and I am a Systems Engineering Architect. I have been working full-time over 17 years in various Mechanical Engineering and Engineering IT roles. In addition to that, I am a volunteer fireman, married to my beautiful wife of 8 years, and a father of three crazy young boys. My major is in Computer Science and Engineering Technology, I attend University of Toledo part-time but I am hoping to graduate Fall 2016 or Spring 2017. Skills I am proficient in:

  • PLM (Teamcenter)
  • CAD (Catia, NX, ProE)
  • Systems Engineering

Some other hobbies I have are exercising: biking, running, weight training; basketball (playing and watching), traveling, and trying new food.

Whoever diligently seeks good seeks favor, but evil comes to him who searches for it. -Proverbs 11:27
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
